name: Sports Car: Full Driving
description:
Sports Car: Full Driving is the best car simulator of 2018, thanks to its advanced real physics engine. Be a furious racer on a whole city for you. No need to brake because of traffic or racing other rival vehicles, so you can perform illegal stunt actions and run full speed without the police chasing you!

FEATURES
Full real HUD including revs, gear and speed.
ABS, TC and ESP simulation. You can also turn them off!
Explore a detailed open world environment.
Realistic car damage. Crash your car!
Accurate physics.
